captions.text: [Wet With Regret from Closer To Me Than Him plays]
My home is your home. Get ready for...
You don't even know it's gonna happen!
OH, it's good to see you!
You know, I've always respected you as a person.
OH, you've always been a good little boy.
What the fuck are you doing here Wade?!
[epic slow mo is not so epic now, is it? :D]

[btw the song is Glub Glub Water Dance,
goddammit stop asking :D]
[epic slow mo is definitely epic again]
It's when you squeeze my face that makes me laugh.
